Annotation.note:
The paper [BIB/Czapor_87a] discusses Groebner basis computations under different heuristics. Remark that tail reduction for lex Groebner bases may be prohibitive. Some remarks on the Groebner factorizer.
It contains the following examples:
Butcher as Problem 2 Fee_3 as Problem 3 Czapor-87 as Problem 4 Czapor-87_1 as Problem 4a Czapor-87_2 as Problem 4b Trinks as Problem 5 Katsura_5 as Problem 6 Rose as Problem 7
